Description: Ostracon bearing 3 lines of Greek text containing a bill written by a notary named Markos and consigning a shipment of 50 artabas of barley to a boat captain.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: West Bank Survey of Sudanese Lower Nubia
Bibliographic references: Ruffini 2010 / Nubian ostraka from the West Bank Survey (no.4)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395058) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395058)
Acquisition name: Donated by: West Bank Survey of Sudanese Lower Nubia
